features: Extra thick ridged foam with center air channel for excellent ventilation
Airmesh wrap hipbelt with zippered fabric pockets provide stability and breathability
ErgoPull waist strap closure system allows for proper snug and stable fit

Included Osprey Hydraulics 1.5L lumbar reservoir by Hydrapak
Large zippered main compartment with reservoir sleeve
Main compartment tool organization and internal zippered pocket
